title: Lucy Powell – 2021 Comments on Licensed Premises
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Lucy Powell, the Shadow Minister for Business and Consumers, on 22 January 2021 when she was commenting on a report suggesting that the Coronavirus crisis has led to the closure of thousands of licensed premises.
content:
The Government’s irresponsible choices have meant many businesses have gone bust on their watch and left the UK with the worst recession of any major economy.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

With many businesses still struggling and facing ruin in the weeks ahead, Ministers must urgently put in place a comprehensive, long term plan to support businesses through the crisis and secure our economy.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
